nodes.text: 2638 was a B1-Series battle droid that operated during the Clone Wars as a member of the Separatist Droid Army. In 19 BBY, the droid served in the Battle of Utapau.
This battle droid's identification number, 2638, can be spotted on its back, in a similar manner to 1138, a droid from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
